Outside the Ark

Neither Uproar or Quickstride had ever encountered such di=
fficulty as the one they were facing now.  Yet they knew they had to keep i=
t together if they were to not let Rodimus down.  Quickstride looks to his =
buddy, who looks to him as well.

"You think'n what I'm thinkn', Uproar?"

=
Uproar nodds.

"When in doubt, resort ta the basics.  I say we just charge =
into there, like a couple of wild animals, and get ourselves caught up in t=
he fluctuation of the force shield around it, and see if we can disrupt it =
long enough ta let Rodimus and the other guys through. Of course, in beast =
mode, would kill our robot modes for sure."

Quickstride nodds.

"You're ri=
ght, that might just be the only way ta disrupt it.  Might sting a little b=
it but it's worth the pain.  But I'm a lot faster on my hooves than you are=
 on your paws.  I vote you stay on top of my back, I charge and that way we=
 both distribute the disruptive energy around the field, long enough for Ro=
dimus ta get through relatively unharmed.. Hopefully. I think I did it befo=
re by accident once..  Oh yeah, when this snake thing came at me from nowhe=
re and spooked the living spark outa me.  The shields were up for some reas=
on and I ran right inta them.  Maaaan did that sting, but after a few days =
in the CR chamber, I was okay."

Uproar nodds.

"If it's just a few days of=
 CR treatment, I don't care.  Rodimus, Sir, this may be the only way we'll =
be able ta get you guys in there. And we'll gladly do it again and again if=
 we have to."

At the Black fortress, inside, Rat Trap quickly looks to Win=
dlord with bugged out eyes.

"GAHHH, OKAY, IT'S TIME FOR TAKEOFF!  WE GOTTA=
 BOGGIE!"

Outside the black fortress, Night Shift desperately hops up on T=
ucson to try and access his shifting collumn to put him into neutral so tha=
t towing him will not tax anyone who is there to push or pull him out of da=
nger.  Tucson has just enough energy to lower his window, and does so for h=
is comrade, who is quick to try and put him into Neutral.  There was a prob=
lem though.  In order to do that someone had to step down lightly on his br=
ake pedal.  Tucson realized it, and with all his might, slowly plunges his =
brake on his own, as Night Shift quickly puts him into neutral.

"Whew, tha=
nks buddy.  Okay, hang in there, we're gonna get you guys outa here pronto.=
"

Tucson responds.

"It's important - to secure - Talon.  Must - put my wi=
ndow back up."

Night Shift nodds, as he gets down in time for Tucson to ge=
t the window back up.

"Right  Okay, guys, we need some help now!  Tucson's=
 got Talon secured safely and we gotta bug outa here pronto!

Straight Shot=
 manages to dart over to Night Shift.

" We gotta clear out!  The fortress =
is gonna blow any time now!  Tucson's way too close, he'll get obliterated =
if he stays here!"
